title: Alimentation Couche-Tard Posts Higher 1Q Profit
text:
By Kimberly Chin

Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. (ATD.A.T, ATD.B.T) on Wednesday said profit rose in the fiscal first quarter though sales fell.

Net income was $538.8 million, or 95 cents a share, up from $455.6 million, or 81 cents a share, a year earlier. Adjusted earnings were 97 cents a share, up from 87 cents a share. Analysts polled by FactSet expected 94 cents a share.

Revenue was $14.16 billion, down from $14.79 billion a year ago. Analysts were looking for $15.13 billion.

Write to Kimberly Chin at kimberly.chin@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

September 04, 2019 17:35 ET (21:35 GMT)
